name: OpenBuild
fullText:
Been exploring why AI Agents struggle with cross-chain operations.

Turns out the lack of atomic guarantees across chains means Agents can't reliably execute without human intervention when things go wrong.

Wrote about @ZetaChain @ZetaChain_CH 's solution - worth a read if https://t.co/I8vmucPX8S
